bug.author: pavelgrib
bug.description:
The docs (<denchmark-link:https://pytorch2keras.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started/>https://pytorch2keras.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started/</denchmark-link> ) have a line that seems to be crucial to making the package work: <denchmark-code>input_var = Variable(torch.FloatTensor(input_np)) </denchmark-code>
but don't specify where this Variable object is imported from or defined. Can you elucidate?

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pavelgrib>@pavelgrib</denchmark-link> . I updated getting started guide. <denchmark-link:https://pytorch2keras.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started/>https://pytorch2keras.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started/</denchmark-link>
